description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trick] Trick Slot with this item to gain this property:

Disarmed On Damage:
Creature has a chance to afflict enemies with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_DISARMED} when it deals damage to them with attacks or spells.

You need 3 of these materials to use them for Socketing.
name: Curio of Disarming
